author: Breitbart Jerusalem
description: Stores were closed, thousands of police were deployed for US President Donald Trump’s walk through the Old City of Jerusalem.
title: Jerusalem's Old City on Lockdown During Trump Trip

author: Breitbart Jerusalem
description: Shortly after landing at Ben-Gurion Airport, US President Donald Trump will fly via helicopter to Jerusalem’s First Station.
title: Upon Landing in Tel Aviv, Trump to Be Transported by Helicopter for Jerusalem Tour

author: Aaron Klein
description: President Donald Trump on Monday visited the Western Wall and the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem as part of his 24-hour tour here in Israel.
title: PICTURES – Trump Visits Western Wall, Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem - Breitbart

author: Eliza Relman
description: On Monday, President Donald Trump became the first sitting US president to visit the Western Wall in Jerusalem, a sacred prayer site for Jews.
title: Trump just made a historic visit to a holy site in Jerusalem

author: Jack Moore
description: The Jerusalem hotel has previously hosted Barack Obama and Vladimir Putin.
title: Inside Donald Trump’s stay at Israel’s King David Hotel: Robots, rocket-proof glass and a $100m price tag

author: Adelle Nazarian
description: Jerusalem Post columnist Caroline Glick defended Sebastian Gorka from defamation and shone a spotlight on the hypocrisy of the left.
title: Caroline Glick Rips Left for Demonizing Sebastian Gorka - Breitbart

author: Ylenia Gostoli
description: Recent raid of Arab Studies Society's Jerusalem office highlights a long-standing problem, rights groups say.
title: How Israel is targeting Palestinian institutions

author: BBC News
description: The US president has strong words for Iran as he meets Israeli leaders in Jerusalem.
title: Trump tells Israel Iran will never have nuclear weapons

author: Spiegel Online
description: Schon vor seinem Besuch in Israel sorgt US-Präsident Trump in Jerusalem für Unruhe. Sein Waffengeschäft mit Saudi-Arabien bereitet israelischen Politikern Kopfschmerzen - zu Recht, finden auch US-Vertreter.
title: US-Waffengeschäft mit Saudi-Arabien: Israel reagiert besorgt auf Trumps Rüstungsdeal

description: Das milliardenschwere Waffengeschäft zwischen den USA und Saudi-Arabien bereitet Israel Kopfzerbrechen. „Das ist eine Angelegenheit, die uns wirklich beunruhigen sollte, sagte Energieminister Juwal Steinitz am Sonntag in Jerusalem.
title: Trump in Riad : Israel besorgt wegen Waffengeschäfts zwischen USA und Saudi-Arabien
